widgetCustomization.heading: Give {{format-reward 'REFERRED' includeUnit=true}} and Got {{format-reward 'REFERRER' includeUnit=true}}!
widgetCustomization.headerDetails: Give a friend {{format-reward 'REFERRED' includeUnit=true includeContextualText=true}} and receive {{format-reward 'REFERRER' includeUnit=true includeContextualText=true}} for yourself when they pay their first bill.
widgetCustomization.shareCodeDetails: Share the link below or use the code **{{user.referralCode}}**
widgetCustomization.registrationHeader:
Thanks for sending your first referral!
Give us your email to ensure you get rewarded when your referral is used.

EMAIL.emailShareBody: Sign up for a {{companyName}} account and we both get {{format-reward 'REFERRED' includeUnit=true includeContextualText=true}}. Use this link {{shareLinks.emailShareLink}}

FACEBOOK.facebookShareBody: Sign up for a {{companyName}} account and we both get {{format-reward 'REFERRED' includeUnit=true includeContextualText=true}}. Use this link {{shareLinks.facebookShareLink}}

TWITTER.twitterShareBody: Sign up for a something {{companyName}} account and we both get {{format-reward 'REFERRED' includeUnit=true includeContextualText=true}}. Use this link {{shareLinks.twitterShareLink}}

SMS.smsShareBody: Sign up for a {{companyName}} account and we both get {{format-reward 'REFERRED' includeUnit=true includeContextualText=true}}. Use this link {{share-link 'SMS'}}

WHATSAPP.whatsAppShareBody: Sign up for a {{companyName}} account and we both get {{format-reward 'REFERRED' includeUnit=true includeContextualText=true}}. Use this link {{share-link 'WHATSAPP'}}

LINKEDIN.linkedinShareBody: Sign up for a {{companyName}} account and we both get {{format-reward 'REFERRED' includeUnit=true includeContextualText=true}}. Use this link {{share-link 'LINKEDIN'}}

at checkout to receive your referral reward

widgetCustomization.registrationHeader:
Thanks for sending your first referral!
Give us your email to ensure you get rewarded when your referral is used.

configuration.subject: You have hit the reward limit!

content.shareCTA: However, you can keep referring new users and giving {{format-reward 'REFERRED' includeUnit=true includeContextualText=true}} with your code. - **{{user.referralCode}}**
content.headerContent:
#Reward Limit
You have successfully referred the maximum!
content.bodyContent: Thanks for spreading the word about {{companyName}}. You've referred so many new people that you've earned the maximum number  of available rewards.

configuration.subject: Congrats! You have earned {{format-reward 'REFERRER' includeUnit=true}} of free credit with {{companyName}}

content.shareCTA: Keep sharing your code and earn more discountss - **{{user.referralCode}}**
content.headerContent:
#Congratulations
Your friend has signed up for a {{companyName}} Account!
content.bodyContent: You have now earned {{format-reward 'REFERRER' includeUnit=true includeContextualText=true}} with {{companyName}}. Refer more friends to save even more!
content.giftcardBodyContent: You have now earned {{format-reward 'REFERRER' includeUnit=true includeContextualText=true}}. You should receive an email shortly with instructions for redemption. Refer more friends to save even more!

configuration.subject: ​{{stringEmptyHandler newReferral.referredUser.firstName onEmpty='A friend'}}​ helped you get one step closer to {{format-reward 'REFERRER' includeUnit=true includeContextualText=true}}!

content.shareCTA: Keep sharing your code and earn more discounts - **{{user.referralCode}}**
content.headerContent:
#Good No!
Your friend has signed up for a free account with {{companyName}}!
content.bodyContent: {{stringEmptyHandler newReferral.referredUser.firstName onEmpty='A friend'}}​ is currently trying out {{companyName}}. As a thank you from us, if they become a paying user, you will automatically receive {{format-reward 'REFERRER' includeUnit=true includeContextualText=true}}
